about.title: A Unique Ambiance, Real Dining Experience
about.content_1: Le Salama offers an unforgettable Moroccan dining experience in the heart of Jemaa El Fna, where you can enjoy lunch or an early dinner while soaking in an amazing view.
about.content_2: The vibrant rooftop sky bar is the perfect place to sip on expertly crafted cocktails, enjoy music and the lively vibe as the sun sets over Marrakech.

events.title: Experience the Magic: Discover Our Shows!
events.content_1: To make the experience even more special, a belly dancer show takes place every night, adding an extra layer of excitement to your evening.
events.content_2: Whether youâ€™re relaxing with drinks, indulging in delicious food, or enjoying the entertainment, Le Salama is a must-visit during your stay in Marrakech, offering a feast for both the senses and the soul.

accordion.desc_2: Dinner with your head in the stars
accordion.desc_3: Immerse yourself in a temple of serenity
accordion.desc_4: Live show Oriental experience and clubbing
